name: 6 feet behind (itch)
description:
Made for the GMTK jam 2020 ( Theme: Out Of Control )

A vengeful spirit and a mysterious group are out to get you. The former has offered you a deal: lead her to the members of the later and you'll get to live a bit more. However, if she catches you, it's over.

Make the insane apparition touch the enemies to defeat them, and avoid touching any of them yourself.

Instructions:

  • Arrow keys / WASD: move.
  • Esc: pause/resume.
  • You can take 3 hits from the enemies, but contact with the ghost is an instant death.
  • Defeat all the enemies in a level to progress.

( If the browser version runs too slow, try the downloadable versions instead )
